name: thick-fat

effect.sun-moon: This Pokémon takes half as much damage from fire- and ice-type moves.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This Pokémon takes half as much damage from fire- and ice-type moves.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This Pokémon takes half as much damage from fire- and ice-type moves.

short_effect: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.
